backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing an e‑book store with user profiles, catalog, carts, orders, KYC records, and admin-only catalog export using storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text listing frontend file paths with short summaries of each component, page, or utility.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment file setting VITE_APP_ENV to Live.
frontend/docs/deployment-preflight.md: Documentation describing required preflight checks before deploying to the Live environment.
frontend/docs/publish-live.md: Instructions for publishing Draft Version 25 to the Live environment without wiping backend state.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the frontend app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/deployment-preflight.sh: Shell script performing environment validation, dependency checks, backend/frontend builds, and bindings generation.
frontend/scripts/publish-live.sh: Shell script running preflight checks and deploying Draft Version 25 to the Live canister without resetting backend state.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the app’s router with all main and admin routes and wraps the UI in theme and router providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookMediaM: Manages uploading and removing PDF, image, audio, and video files for a book with progress and validation.
Guards admin-only pages by checking identity and admin status and shows appropriate access or error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout functionality using Internet Identity with status handling and feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and saves it via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/books/BookCard.t: Renders a clickable book card showing cover, title, author, pricing, and availability badges.
frontend/src/components/books/CoverImage: Displays a book cover image using a fixed generated asset with a fallback placeholder on error.
frontend/src/components/checkout/KycVeri: Handles client-side KYC document submission, validation, and displays verification completion status.
frontend/src/components/checkout/SelfieC: Empty placeholder file for selfie capture functionality.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Displays a centered empty-state message with optional icon, description, and action.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with contact links, customer support chat, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top navigation bar showing logo, links, environment badge, user balance, cart, and auth-aware sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Page wrapper rendering header, footer, main content outlet, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Generic page container applying configurable max-width and padding layout classes.
frontend/src/components/library/BookCont: Dialog displaying purchased book content and media with loading, error states, previews, and download handlers.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Button to fetch and download a purchased book’s PDF with permission handling and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/support/Customer: Customer support chat dialog allowing users to send messages and view threaded responses.
frontend/src/config/environment.ts: Determines app environment (Draft or Live) from build-time variables and exports APP_ENVIRONMENT.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React-query hook creating and caching the backend actor, updating on identity changes, and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecovery.ts: Mutation hook to trigger admin access recovery with descriptive error mapping and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and checking admin status based on the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Hooks for retrieving the user's token balance and minting tokens with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and uploading content for books using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Hooks to manage the user's cart, including fetching, adding, removing items, checkout, and combining cart data with book info.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalogTransfer.ts: Provides mutations to export and import the full catalog state and invalidates related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useKyc.ts: Mutation hook to submit KYC proofs and invalidate cart data on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: Hooks to fetch the user's library of purchased books and retrieve purchased book content or media.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Hooks for fetching individual orders, user orders, and all orders from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for organizing query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetStore.ts: Mutation to reset backend store state and invalidate all relevant caches with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupportChat.ts: Hooks for sending support messages, fetching user/admin messages, and responding to messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Admin interface for viewing, filtering, adding, editing, managing media, and deleting books in the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Main admin dashboard with tabbed navigation to catalog, orders, minting, support, and settings pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMintPage.t: Form for admins to mint GLDT tokens to a specified principal using backend minting hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays a table of all orders with customer info, items, totals, and dates, using book lookups for item titles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRecoveryPa: Provides admin access recovery flow requiring II login, with success and error handling states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin interface for resetting, exporting, and importing catalog data with file parsing, validation, and confirmation flows.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Admin view for browsing support message threads and sending replies with message grouping and refresh handling.
frontend/src/pages/BookDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed book info, handles add-to-cart logic with auth, sold-out, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows cart contents, supports removing items, validates single-copy issues, and navigates to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Lists available books with search filtering and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including balance checks, KYC validation, and order submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section and a featured books preview.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Displays purchased books, supports reading and downloading media content.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details, fetching order and book info and offering navigation to library or catalog.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseConfirmationP: Shows a purchase completion message with actions to view the library, order details, or continue shopping.
frontend/src/utils/catalogTransfer.ts: Utilities for validating, parsing, and merging catalog JSON files, including import mode logic.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Helper functions to trigger file downloads, including JSON and binary data.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formatting utilities for token amounts, principals, and timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/kyc.ts: Functions for deriving KYC IDs and validating document numbers.
Detects KYC‑restriction backend errors and maps them to user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/orderId.ts: Generates unique order IDs using timestamp and randomness.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Parses principal strings into Principal objects with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for deploying Version 25 to the specified live domain and lists existing features and in-progress requests related to the deployment.
